Medium.notes: DS, Capped and uncapped SL, single capped AI

Challenging.notes: 2 uncapped SL, capped and uncapped AI, 3 easy PBs
Challenging.notes2: Note we split up the regular and PBs because the PBs need to be in order to ensure no duplicate personalities.
Challenging.notes3: The 'bots' set will be suffled into the list to make the slots random.
